author: Kayleigh Roberts
title: Beckham Family Skiing and Snowboarding Vacation in Canada
text: A post shared by David Beckham (@davidbeckham) on Feb 17, 2017 at 10:34am PST Most Popular A post shared by David Beckham (@davidbeckham) on Feb 17, 2017 at 10:35am PST A post shared by Victoria Beckham (@victoriabeckham) on Feb 17, 2017 at 2:29pm PST Advertisement - Continue Reading Below A post shared by David Beckham (@davidbeckham) on Feb 17, 2017 at 10:35am PST A post shared by David Beckham (@davidbeckham) on Feb 17, 2017 at 10:49am PST Advertisement - Continue Reading Below A post shared by David Beckham (@davidbeckham) on Feb 17, 2017 at 3:27pm PST Most Popular A post shared by Cruz Beckham (@cruzbeckham) on Feb 11, 2017 at 11:40am PST A post shared by Victoria Beckham (@victoriabeckham) on Feb 17, 2017 at 3:02pm PST Victoria and Harper, 5, even sported matching outfits. A post shared by David Beckham (@davidbeckham) on Feb 17, 2017 at 10:50am PST Advertisement - Continue Reading Below A post shared by Victoria Beckham (@victoriabeckham) on Feb 17, 2017 at 12:04pm PST A post shared by David Beckham (@davidbeckham) on Feb 17, 2017 at 10:35am PST But not everyone had the best time. David and Victoria's oldest son, Brooklyn, 17, broke his collarbone in a snowboarding accident. A post shared by bb (@brooklynbeckham) on Feb 17, 2017 at 10:46am PST
